description: This file defines an Angular service called SupabaseService that manages the creation and configuration of a Supabase client instance. It retrieves configuration parameters from environment variables or global variables, handles missing credentials, and provides a mock implementation for server-side rendering. The class exposes the Supabase client for other components to interact with a Supabase backend.

classes.name: SupabaseService
classes.description: An Angular service encapsulating the Supabase client setup with environment-based configuration and SSR fallback.

methods.name: constructor() { constructor
methods.description: Initializes the Supabase client using environment variables or global variables. Provides a fallback for SSR and browser environments, throwing an error if credentials are missing during runtime on the browser.
